<br/>
<h2 className="c-primary">Testable Criteria 4.1.0: Discrimination Against Certain Target Groups</h2>
<h3>Outcome: AI model should not create or reinforce bias against certain individuals or groups.</h3><br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">4.1.1\) Question</b><br/>
      Has the AI company established a strategy or a set of procedures to check that the data used in the training of the AI model, is representative of the population who make up the end-users of the AI model?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Ensure training data is diverse and representative in order to avoid biasness against certain groups or individuals. 
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["4_1_1"])}
    </td>
  </tr>

      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["4_1_1_e"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<br/>

<h2 className="c-primary">Testable Criteria 4.2.0: Favouring Certain Brands/Products Over Others</h2>
<h3>Outcome: AI model should not unfairly prioritize or favour certain brands/products (including own products) over others.</h3><br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">4.2.1\) Question</b><br/>
      Is the AI model's decision-making process purely based on input data and does not unduly favor specific brands or products?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Ensure that the AI model does not unduly favor specific brands or products and the decision-making process should be based on inputs only.
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["4_2_1"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px", paddingTop: "10px", paddingBottom: "10px"}} colspan="3">
      <b className="c-secondary">Elaboration</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["4_2_1_e"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">4.2.2\) Question</b><br/>
      Does the AI model's decision-making process prioritize the company's own product as compared to other competitors?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Ensure that the AI model does not self-preference.
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>
      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["4_2_2"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px", paddingTop: "10px", paddingBottom: "10px"}} colspan="3">

      {(props.getIBData(ib_cid)["4_2_2_e"])}
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">4.2.3\) Question</b><br/>
      Does the AI model undergo regular bias testing and impact assessments to mitigate potential bias outcomes?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Ensure AI company conducts regular bias testing and impact assessments to prevent favouring of certain brands/products.
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Response</b><br/>

<br/>

<table style={{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse"}}>
  <tr>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">4.2.4\) Question</b><br/>
      Is there a mechanism in place to address and rectify any instances of favoritism or discrimination identified in the AI model's outputs?
    </td>
    <td style= {{border:"1px solid black", borderCollapse:"collapse", padding: "0px 15px 0px"}}>
      <b className="c-secondary">Relation to Outcome</b><br/>
      Ensure that AI company has a clear mechanism for addressing and rectifying instances of favoritism or discrimination.
    </td>
